overview: BETWEEN SOMETHING & NOTHING is based on filmmaker Todd Verowâ€™s experiences at Rhode Island School of Design. After being accepted into a prestigious New England art school, sexy small-town JOE and townie mastermind JENNIFER quickly join forces. They are determined to succeed on a campus over-populated with jaded mega-rich kids awash in trust funds, abortions and drugs galore.
title: Between Something & Nothing
